predicate.note: Frames file for 'reestablish' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to bring back into existence or use

example.name: transitive
example.text: Stock-index arbitrage , because it sells the more `` expensive '' market and buys the `` cheaper '' one , attempts [*-1] to reestablish the link between the stock and futures markets , and the adjustments are often abrupt .
example.arg: the link between the stock and futures markets
